title: Latvian Foreign Ministry turns in its annual report
summary_full: On Tuesday, 13th January 2026, the Latvian Cabinet of Ministers reviewed the report submitted by the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Baiba Braže, on foreign affairs in 2025 and plans for Latvia’s foreign policy and European Union (EU) affairs in 2026.
